name: Into the memories
description:
On a strange, deserted planet a little robot is waked up with no memory of who he is and how he got here.  There are memory particles all around. Will it help him remember? And would he want to remember?

If you get stuck here are the main cheat codes that you can use in the game.

!SPOILERS!
  • awake — wakes the robot
  • help — gives some useful (or not) tips
  • reduce weight — helps with jumping higher
  • gain weight — returns weight to normal
  • use water — spread water around you
